/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are a mix of modern skyscrapers and older, more traditional buildings, creating a fascinating contrast. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The street itself is busy with cars and buses in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting both the natural and man-made elements of the cityscape.
